name: Chocolate Frozen Yogurt
author: BREEZYLOU
summary: Wonderfully rich frozen yogurt. The taste is like chocolate cream pie filling with a bit of tang from the yogurt. Lots of calcium, but low in fat and calories - a sweet treat you can feel good about!
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can fat-free evaporated milk
directions: Stir together the cornstarch and sugar, and place in a saucepan
Stir in the evaporated milk, and chocolate chips
Cook over medium heat until chocolate is melted and the mixture is thickened
Remove the mixture from the heat, and stir in the plain yogurt and vanilla
Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker, and freeze according to the manufacturer's instructions
